remarks: Lemma for ~ lcfr .  Closure of vector sum with colinear vectors.  TODO: Move down ` N ` definition so top hypotheses can be shared. (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcfrlem6.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfrlem6.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem6.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem6.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
lcfrlem6.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
lcfrlem6.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfrlem6.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcfrlem6.q $e |- Q = ( LSubSp ` D ) $.
lcfrlem6.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfrlem6.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Q ) $.
lcfrlem6.e $e |- E = U_ g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) $.
lcfrlem6.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. E ) $.
lcfrlem6.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. E ) $.
lcfrlem6.en $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) = ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lcfrlem6 $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. E ) $.
$d .+ g $.
$d U g $.
$d X g $.
$d Y g $.
$d g ph $.
